title: Goregous Rent To Own in Richmond!
posting_body: Ready to own but not ready for a mortgage?
Lease a house while you prepare for a mortgage, and buy it back at any time.
Pick the house of your choice and have up to 3 years to buy it back!
Hello!
I'm a local realtor who specializes in Divvy rent-to-own homes.
Contact me to learn more about this amazing program that lets you get into a home and on the way to homeownership.
If interested, you MUST MEET *ALL* qualifications:
$0 Application Fee!
550+ credit score or higher
$40,000+ annual income from 2 co-applicants
Employed at least 3 months
No bankruptcies or evictions in the past 12 months
Only a 1-2% down payment is needed
This amazing program helps you save because 25% of the Rent goes towards a down payment!!
If this isn't the home you'd like you can pick almost any home for sale.
Please send a text message or click the link below to learn more about this incredible opportunity.
Grant Rogers
